title: Rotating Game Mode Queue Question.
body: Is there a list on what game modes will be coming in the coming Rotating Game Modes or is there somewhere I can go to find out this information? Any help will be appreciated.

replies.body: They announced earlier in the year that they aren't making RGM come out every patch/weekend and I can't quite find a fuller schedule, but it [looks like next one will be One For All](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/editorial/upcoming-changes-rotating-game-modes) in patch 8.6 (we are on 8.4 now)
Argh, absolutely hate that they've taken them away... Let people have what they want!!! I'm sure they have it the way it is so they can make it into a money scheme
I think its more that they can make the queues feel special again, while working on new modes and fixing some of the old ones for the new client.
